snippet.title: Doors of Insanity: ReOpened Out Now Trailer
snippet.description:
Trapped in a maze of infinite doors, there's only one way out: take up a peculiar weapon, battle a horde of strange enemies, and get some help from even weirder allies!

Roguelite deckbuilders and RPG mechanics combine in Doors of Insanity: ReOpened, a remastered version of the original Doors of Insanity with new cards, new enemies, and new features. 

Out now on Steam for 40% OFF, and owners of the original Doors of Insanity get ReOpened for free!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2860020/Doors_of_Insanity_ReOpened/
